#summary The list-style-type property specifies the appearance of the list item marker.
#labels about-css,is-css-property,from-w3c

You are here: [Welcome Home] > [CSSReference CSS Reference] > [CSSProperties Properties] > *list-style-type*

== Usage ==

== Values ==

  * `disc`
  * `circle`
  * `square`
  * `decimal`

  * `upper-roman`
  * `lower-greek`
  * `lower-latin`
  * `upper-latin`

  * `lower-alpha`
  * `upper-alpha`

  * `inherit`
